nodes.text: Grievous's Providence-class Dreadnought (Campaign against the Shadow Collective)

A Providence-class Dreadnought served as the command ship of General Grievous during the Confederacy of Independent Systems's campaign against the Shadow Collective. It was boarded by the Nightbrother during the Battle of Ord Mantell.
In Darth Maul—Son of Dathomir 2, the displays of Grievous' command chair depict a map of Earth.
